attributes.action: greatly increase the finance available for front line military operations by reducing the numbers of senior officers in the armed forces
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The number of senior officers in the armed forces is out of all proportion to the number of lower ranks who form the front-line of our defence capability. Drastically reducing the number of senior officers and thus reducing bureaucracy would allow much more of the limited defence budget to be targeted at essential operations.
